article.title: koha-elasticsearch
article.info:
Koha is the first free software library automation package.
The Koha Community http://koha-community.org/

refnamediv.refpurpose: Manage Elasticsearch-related tasks for Koha instances.

refsect1.title: Description
refsect1.para: Provides Elasticsearch-related tasks for Koha instances. An action needs to be passed.

listitem.para: Makes koha-elasticsearch rebuild Elasticsearch indexes based on the parameters. By default it rebuilds both authority and bibliographic records. This behaviour can be controlled with the -a and -b parameters.
In conjunction with --rebuild, it deletes existing indexes before reindexing.
In conjunction with --rebuild, it reloads the settings from the Elasticsearch files set in koha-conf.xml . This option implies delete.
In conjunction with --rebuild, it triggers authority record reindexing.
In conjunction with --rebuild it triggers bibliographic record reindexing.
Specifies how many records will be batched up before they are added to Elasticsearch (default: 5000). Higher values lead to better performance, but take more RAM.
Be verbose. Useful for debugging indexing problems.
